Docs.summary: Provides a calendar adapter class for the HTML adapter set. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The mobile <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar> instantiates a .NET Framework <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> for its logic; the HTML adapter simply uses this control for rendering.
